Tibia.Objects.Item

Tibia.Objects.Item Class Reference

Represents one stack of items. Can also represent a type of item (with no location in memory). More...

Inherited by Tibia.Objects.Ammunition, Tibia.Objects.Food, and Tibia.Objects.Rune.

Detailed Description

Represents one stack of items. Can also represent a type of item (with no location in memory).
